title: Interpretation of black in a dream

preview.html: As part of the interpretation of our dreams, we present to you the interpretation of lions in a dream according to what was interpreted by the great scholar Ibn Sirin and Imam Ibn Shaheen. To see an unknown predator in a dream, people turn to the imams of interpretation to find out the meaning of their dreams and whether the lion in the dream portends good or bad. Interpretation of lions in a dreamInterpretation of lions in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin says that if the sleeper sees a lion in his dream, this is evidence of the presence of a person Cunning and cunning those around him want to harm and harm him. If the sleeper dreams of the presence of a lion. Standing in front of him is a sign of the death of someone close to him in the coming period, and seeing a lion entering the house is a sign that the date of the dreamer’s death is near. If the dreamer sees that there is a lion entering the city in which he lives, this is a sign of the entry of many diseases and pests into the city, and seeing it tamed A lion in a dream is evidence of this. It will get rid of the problems that a person faces with his enemies. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is being attacked by a lion, this indicates the emergence of many problems that he will face in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing lions in a dream by Ibn Shaheen The scholar Ibn Shaheen believes that a lion in a dream Evidence of the strength of the dreamer’s character. If the dreamer sees that he is fighting with a lion, this is a sign of intense hostility with a strong personality. And when a man sees in his dream that he is riding on the back of a lion, this is good news that he will gain a lot of power and glory. A dream about kissing a lion indicates high status. High in society. If the dreamer sees a lion attacking him, this indicates the arrival of many problems in his life in the coming period. Interpretation of lions in a dream for a single girl. Seeing a lion in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of the problems she faces in her life and the fears that strengthen her. But if A single girl dreamed that she was running away from a lion, this indicates that she will get rid of all the problems and difficulties that she is going through. Seeing eating lion meat in an unmarried girl’s dream is a good vision and good news for her that her wedding date is near with an honest and good man, who will shower her with love and live a happy life. With him. Interpretation of seeing lions in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees a lion in her dream, this is a sign that there are many people in her life who are planning problems for her, wishing her harm and evil, and seeking to destroy her home. And if a married woman sees that she is killing a lion in a dream, this is good news that she She will get a lot of sustenance and many good things, in addition to an improvement in her husband’s financial situation in the coming period. If a married woman dreams that she is eating lion meat, this is a good vision that indicates stability and security in her home and that she will live a happy life with her husband in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing lions In a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman dreams of a lion, this is a sign that her upcoming pregnancy will be difficult and her birth will be difficult. And if she sees in her dream that she is eating lion meat, this is good news for an easy and trouble-free birth. Seeing a lion in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her fetus male.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing curtains in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see curtains in a dream and references to the good and evil of curtains in a dream for single, married and pregnant women, interpretation of white, colored or black curtains and a dream of putting on and removing curtains. They are used for beautification in different places, as the types and colors of curtains have varied, and their materials have become many and beautiful, and today we will explain to you the dream that many people have had and want the best interpretation, such as the interpretation of a dream about curtains in their various forms. Interpretation of a dream about seeing curtains by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about seeing curtains. Ibn Sirin interprets many Among the signs and indicators that we will talk about in detail. The interpretation of a dream about seeing curtains covering all the windows of the house in a dream indicates privacy and hides the secrets of the dreamer. Also, Ibn Sirin interprets the interpretation of dreaming about curtains in a dream as a sign of a fair wife. Seeing white curtains indicates stability and tranquility. Among family members. Interpretation of seeing windows and curtains in a dream indicates an investigation into achievements and progress in work and study. Interpretation of a dream about hanging curtains means changing the dreamer’s life for the better. Interpretation of a dream about curtains falling in a dream indicates revealing a secret. Interpretation of dreams about curtains hanging on the doors of the mosque As an abbreviation for worship and prayer. Seeing red curtains in a dream indicates a love story that no one has announced. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing black curtains in a dream as sadness and misguidance. Seeing yourself buying curtains in a dream indicates many blessings and good deeds. Interpretation of a dream about curtains for a woman Single woman: The interpretation of seeing curtains in a dream for a single girl has several different connotations and connotations. When an unmarried girl sees that she is buying curtains, this indicates an upcoming marriage. Seeing white curtains in a dream for a single girl indicates that her life is full of joy and happiness. Seeing an unmarried girl putting curtains in A dream means marriage and turning her life towards a better future. When an unmarried girl sees curtains in bright and beautiful colors in her dream, this means happiness and pleasure for her. Seeing bright and light curtains in a dream for a single girl, especially red color, indicates a stable romantic relationship. Seeing green curtains indicates In a dream for an unmarried girl, it indicates the presence of a good person with good morals and parental care. Interpretation of pink curtains in a dream for an unmarried girl, which indicates an affair that will turn into a government union for engagement and marriage soon. Interpretation of a dream about curtains for a married woman. Seeing a married woman buying curtains indicates the presence of a surplus In wealth and money. Seeing a married woman in a dream with many beautiful curtains indicates an exaggeration in the number of children. Seeing a married woman putting curtains in a dream indicates a bright and wonderful future. The interpretation of seeing blue curtains in a dream for a married woman indicates health and well-being. Seeing curtains White in a dream for a married woman indicates protection, abundant living, and blessings for children. If a married woman sees beautiful curtains, it is a solution.

title: Interpretation of a dream about pajamas by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pajamas in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Clothes differ from each other, some are suitable for men’s clothing and others are suitable for women. The types of fabrics differ from each other and there are many colors of these clothes. There are people who specialize in making clothes and sewing them skillfully, and in many dreams some people see clothes in a dream, The interpretation of this vision varies according to the situation of the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about pajamas in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Pajamas in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Among the indications of seeing pajamas in a dream or wearing them, according to what the famous dream interpreter Ibn Sirin sees, is as follows: Seeing the same person wearing pajamas In a dream, it means that his wedding date is approaching. As for the one who sees a large number of pajamas stacked on top of each other, this indicates that the dreamer may suffer from various diseases. Or it could be a sign of death. As for the one who sees old pajamas in his dream, It is a sign of the return of an old relationship between the dreamer and someone. As for him buying new pajamas in his dream, it may be a sign of the dreamer’s journey. Or it may indicate his departure to a distant area. If the person is single, this may be a sign of his imminent marriage. If the dreamer is married, this indicates his happiness and stability in his life. Seeing luxurious pajamas is a sign of happy news. As for the one who gave the man pajamas in his sleep, this means happy news. And whoever sees in his dream that he lost his pajamas, this means that he is suffering from problems and disputes. See also: Interpretation of a dream about wearing school clothes for single women in detail. Interpretation of a dream about new pajamas for single women. Seeing a single girl in a dream in a dream has many meanings and connotations, including: Seeing her as unmarried indicates that she will get married soon. But if she buys new pajamas in a dream, It means that good changes will occur in this girl’s life. Seeing herself refusing to wear it shows her rejection of marriage. Also, seeing pajamas can symbolize the success of the visionary, as well as being an indication of her excellence. If she loses her pajamas in a dream, this means that there are problems in Her life is trying to resolve. And if someone gives her satin pajamas, this is a sign of her marriage, which will be soon. If her pajamas are torn in her dream, this indicates the cancellation of her engagement, if the girl is engaged. See also: Interpretation of a dream about buying children’s clothes in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about pajamas for a woman Divorced Seeing pajamas in a divorced woman’s dream, especially if she is new, may indicate that she may marry a good man, or the dream may indicate the beginning of a new plan for that woman, and seeing green pajamas indicates piety and justice. And to preserve her prayers and worship. Interpretation of a dream of wearing pink pajamas for a married woman: When a married woman sees pajamas in her dream, this has many meanings related to her, and we will describe her vision of them in the following lines: If she sees pink or pink pajamas, this is a sign of the stability of her married life, as well as

title: Prayer for the death of the mother

preview.html: A mother is the most important thing in life. When a mother dies, a person loses the joy of life, and it is considered the greatest misfortune, leaving him with an amputated heart that does not know the meaning of peace, happiness, and tenderness. . He gathered with us a prayer for the death of the mother. A prayer for the death of the mother. Have mercy on my mother, light her grave, expand her entrance, and make the sky her seat and comfort. My Lord, forgive the body that carried us for nine months while it was weak, its bones were cracked, and its skin was torn, so we deprived him of rest and sleep and absorbed enough of his health to satisfy his illness. My Lord, send my mother a light from Your light upon her, raise the light to her grave, expand her entrance, and separate her. Oh God, forgive and have mercy on my mother. Oh God, my mother extended her hands. The simplest gifts for my mother. Bring her the greatness with your vast presence with which you open her chest to worship and obey your people. You and do what you want, help her when you are asked to do so and let her rest like the highest paradise. Forgive my mother, may God have mercy on her, and make her grave a paradise, and forbid her body from hell, and make me among her righteous people after her death, and make her abiding in me. The highest heaven in heaven and all Muslims. Oh God, O Ever-Living, we call upon you by your greatest name, even if you are called, you answer that you extend your blessings and mercy to my mother and forgive her so that there are no sins. He hurt her. Oh God, please, mother, the highest heaven I can descend to. Oh God, build her a house in heaven and let us meet there. Oh God, pour it from the basin of your Prophet Muhammad. Peace be upon him. It has a sweet breeze after which you do not feel thirsty. A supplication for the death of a mother. The best supplications for the death of mothers. Oh God, I seek help from my mother to forgive her and have mercy on her, and to make her grave the garden of Paradise, and to make her body from hell, and to make her dwell in the heights of the garden of Paradise. Oh God, bring my mother and your mothers to Paradise without judgment and without previous martyrdom. An invitation that comes from the heart. So I sent it as a prayer for my mother, your mother, and the mothers of Muslims and Muslims. Oh God, do not make it a sin, but rather forgive him, and he is only his profession, and there is no need for the needs of the world that please you and you have good in it, except for his cause, and enter that the Most High. sky. Oh God, whoever among us converted to Islam, Islam will be upon him, and whoever died among us, and his death was on the basis of faith. Oh God, have mercy on this world and the other, and have mercy on them, and have mercy on us, and have mercy on the nation of Muhammad, and have mercy on us all, and enrich us with the mercy of others. Oh God, replace her with a house better than her house and better than her family, with an offspring better than her offspring and a wife. Better than her husband, and grant her Paradise for no reason with your mercy, O Merciful One. Oh God, feed her from heaven, give her from heaven, show her her place in heaven and say to her: “Enter by any door you want.” Oh God, send your light from your light to my mother. Oh God, light up her grave, widen her entrance, and miss her in its ruins. A prayer for the death of a mother speaking about the death of hopes. Oh God, move her from the narrowness of the forest and from the shelters of worms to your eternal paradise. There is no god but You, O tenderness, O manan, O splendor of the heavens and the earth, cover them with your mercy. O Most Merciful, Most Merciful. I will never forget you, my mother, no matter how generous God is in my life, and I will never forget the day you were at my school with a handkerchief in my pocket. Mom, I miss you, I miss your prayers, your laughter, your conversations, your advice, I miss everything that you were, Mom, God bless you. Today is the anniversary of the death of the most precious people to me, who were all mine, the candle of the house, the best of

title: Interpretation of a dream about red shoes: Seeing yourself wearing red shoes in a dream

preview.html: Contents: A dream of buying red shoes for a single woman, high heels for a pregnant woman, red slippers by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about red shoes. If you see that you are wearing new shoes, this means that you are preparing to start a new phase in your life, and this may be the beginning of marriage, entering into a romantic relationship, or even starting a new career. If your shoes are comfortable and you see that you are walking comfortably, this means that this beginning will bring you psychological comfort and you will be happy, which means that success and luck will smile at you. If the color of the shoes is red in the dream, this means strength and happiness. If the dreamer is a woman, but if The dreamer was a man, so red shoes are his companion, beautiful and bright. If the shoes are torn and uncomfortable, this means that the new stage will be difficult and you may face failure, so be careful before making your choices for marriage or accepting a new job offer or any project you are planning or offers that are being made to you. Torn and dirty shoes may mean that you are not yet ready to make a decision or that you are not ready to take a step required of you, so do not rush. It is possible that the dreamer sees in a dream a shoe made of fire and here it indicates a strong woman, and if he sees it made of wood then it is a hypocritical and treacherous woman. If If a shoe sole is broken in a dream, then the matter indicates the death of one of the brothers or partners, and the only one, as it is said, the brother sometimes appears in a dream. On the other hand, shoes in a dream indicate marriage, and the characteristics of the partner differ according to the type and specifications of the shoe. The shoe may indicate a specific land or place, Whoever wears new shoes goes to a new land, and whoever takes off the shoes dies. Among the interpretations of shoes in a dream is that they indicate protection, prevention, removal, illusion, fear, and weakness. On the other hand, the shoe can be a place or a home. The type of shoe indicates the formal interpretation means work, the sporty means a leisure trip and the long shoe indicates the home. A shoe with a silver sole in a dream shows a free and beautiful woman, even if it is not made of silver but Of lead, it indicates a weak woman. Interpretation of a dream about shoes - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about eating pies in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing yourself eating pancakes in a dream is not as difficult as some people think. Seeing pancakes usually indicates family and social relationships, and you may also be interested in meeting basbousa in a dream. If pancakes come in a dream that taste delicious and delicious, then this indicates an abundance of nutrition and an abundance of goodness, and in this article I will tell you many indications for seeing pancakes in a dream in detail, and God knows best. Seeing yourself eating pancakes in a dream indicates the fatigue that the dreamer exerts to achieve his goals and make every effort to achieve them. Seeing pancakes Circularity in a dream shows that the dreamer has a desire to share success with others. Seeing yourself making pancakes in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and goals and the dreamer achieving what he wants. Eating pancakes in a dream for a single woman. title: Meanings of dreaming about red and the symbols of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the color red, meanings and symbols, by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, via the website roy2a.com’s vision. The color red is considered one of the most famous and widespread colors among the rest of the colors, and you find many differences, and some take it as a color expressing the degree of intense love, on Valentine’s Day. For example, it is one of the most famous events around the world where it is used in abundance, so it is found in flowers, gifts, clothes, etc. We will present the most important evidence that has emerged: Seeing the color red in a dream. This is according to the great interpreters of dreams, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow them. Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream. Seeing a dark red color in a dream. Indicating status and value at the forefront of people. Seeing a red veil or veil indicates a lot of nutrients and benefits for the dreamer. Seeing yourself wearing red clothes in a dream indicates that an official or president will come to wartime. As for seeing yourself wearing red in a man’s dream? It is a sign that he likes to stay awake and run according to his whims. Seeing a red shirt in a dream indicates money coming to the viewer from His work or trade.Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin repeats seeing the color red in a dream. For the most part, its meaning can be a reference to brilliance, energy, and vitality. Or the color red, whether in solid materials or in plants, expresses the intensity of love and intimacy. Seeing Red color in a dream can be a warning or a warning about the coming of danger. Seeing the abstract color red in a dream indicates committing sins or losing feelings and emotions. What about seeing the sky red in a dream? It is an indication that there are enemies of the pioneer who want to set him up, or that the dreamer is a person who does not He is popular because of his mistreatment of people. Seeing the flames caused by fires are red in a dream with the strength and energy that the viewer hides inside him and wants to highlight and show on the ground. Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream for a single woman. Seeing the color red in a dream for a single woman indicates your feelings, affection, and emotions. The color red appears For an unmarried woman in Ibn Sirin, she is a girl who has energy, hope, and a love of life who challenges the bright future. Seeing an unmarried woman wearing a red dress in a dream indicates that she will succeed, excel, and reach her goals, whether practical or academic. I see myself wearing a red coat in one dream, which indicates that her marriage to a young man is approaching. Religion and morals, and it will be a source of happiness for her. Interpretation of seeing the color red in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a married woman wearing red clothes in a dream indicates feelings of familiarity, love and understanding between them. Seeing her wearing a red dress indicates a married woman in a dream. There is something that you hope will happen and it will happen and you are happy with it. Children wearing red clothes in a dream Married woman She is raising her children well and they will have a great future. I want to see a drink of red wine for a married woman In her dream, it is a sign of bad news

title: The most important interpretations of seeing the call to prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing the call to prayer in a dream: The ear is one of the good things that fills the heart with joy and happiness. As for dreams, do their meanings and interpretations indicate the discovery of good things or does insight receive bad things? Seeing the call to prayer in a dream Many of the leading interpretation scholars said that seeing the ear in a dream indicates that the dreamer has many Good qualities and that he is a person who devotes himself to all matters of his religion and always considers God in any work he does. Seeing an ear in a man’s dream indicates many blessings and gifts that will fill his life in the coming periods, which will put him in a reasonable financial position and will not suffer from many financial crises. The most important interpretation experts also said that seeing an ear in a dream shows the good behavior of the dreamer in all matters of his life. Because he is a wise person and faces the problems of his life with patience and calm. Seeing the call to prayer in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing the call to prayer in a dream means that the dreamer will end his romantic relationship due to the many problems and disagreements and lack of good understanding between them in the coming periods. The great scholar Ibn Sirin said that Seeing an ear in the dreamer’s dream indicates the occurrence of many very major crises that will cause him to sever his relationship with the people closest to him in the coming days. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing the ear twice in a dream indicates that the dreamer will visit the House of God soon. Website Secrets for Dream Interpretation is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write a website about dream interpretation secrets. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing the call to prayer in a single woman’s dream. If an unmarried woman sees that she hears the call to prayer while she is in the bathroom while she is sleeping, then she will kill you, a sign of... She has bad character and harms everyone around her, and she must correct herself to avoid God’s severe punishment for what he does. Meanwhile, if a girl sees that her ear is hesitant, but with some words deleted in her dream, this is an indication that she is unfairly delving into the symptoms of many people. But If an unmarried woman sees herself listening at the door of a man of high authority in her dream, it means that she has many undesirable qualities, and this always makes many people turn away from her so as not to succeed her. He was injured because of it. Seeing the call to prayer in a dream for a married woman. Many of the most important experts in interpretation said that if a married woman sees herself making the call to prayer in her dream, this is a sign that she will receive many sudden events to a large extent that will make her suffer from a mental disorder. But if the woman sees That her son called her to prayer in her dream, this is evidence of many injustices to which her son is being exposed by many people, but the truth will soon emerge. But if a married woman sees herself saying the call to prayer in front of many people during her sleep, this indicates that there are many corrupt people among them. And those who hate, and she must stay away from them completely because they do not know the truth. Seeing the call to prayer in a dream for a pregnant woman. Many prominent interpretation scholars said that seeing the call to prayer in a dream

title: Interpretation of seeing a skeleton in a dream

preview.html: The skeleton in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted it as seeing a skeleton in a dream and that it is a sign of illness. As he said, it is said that a major injury to the dreamer of a relative. Who sees it? Attacks his skeleton in a dream, indicates a major disaster that will cause severe sadness and distress. Seeing a large number of skeletons in a dream indicates distress Excessive thinking about the future. Whoever sees himself sleeping next to the temple The skeleton indicates that the deity is in great danger that threatens his life and may lead to death. When someone dreams of seeing the skeleton of one of his acquaintances, this is a sign of a great enmity between them. Whoever knows the skeleton dance in a dream indicates tension and anxiety for the dreamer. Seeing the skeleton in a dream for a single woman Seeing the skeleton in the dream of an unmarried girl indicates that he is also suffering from vision nightmares due to the psychological pressure she is going through. Seeing the skeletons of animals in a dream, a sign of food and is very good for the dreamer. Whoever sees the skeleton of a dog appears The owner of the vision went through a failed love story and feels sad about it. As for the one you see, he collects the skeletons of cats Dogs are a sign of marriage to a wealthy man, but the source of his money is illegitimate. Seeing a skeleton in a dream for a married woman A married woman who dreams of a pet skeleton indicates that she will get what she wants and increase her livelihood. Seeing a chicken skeleton shows the stability of her family life. Anyone who sees that he is eating from the bones of a skeleton in a dream is a sign of hearing the good news. As for her seeing her body coming out of her skeleton in a dream, this is clearly pregnancy. Seeing a skeleton in a man's dream Whoever sees a cow skeleton in a dream shows that his wedding with his girlfriend. Whoever hugs a skeleton in a dream, this indicates that he will be offended by a member of his family. Add the dream you want to interpret by referring to the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing water in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of seeing water in a dream from Ibn Sirin through the following lines. He was right when he said that water is the secret of life and the basis for the existence of many living organisms. God Almighty said in His Noble Book, and He is the most truthful one who says: “And God did not send down water from the sky and revived the earth with it after its death.” We will find out through today's Encyclopedia article, so stay tuned.Interpretation of seeing water in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of seeing water in a dream by Ibn Sirin Our respected scholar believes that since water is one of the main factors of life on the surface of the Earth, seeing it is a sign of great goodness, as well as the love and peace that lives In which they are truly human. In some cases, water in a dream is a sign of the dreamer’s ability to get rid of enemies who harbor evil and wickedness, especially if the dreamer finds that water is flowing in abundance. Drinking water in a dream is interpreted as a sign of hearing good news in the near future, In addition, it is a symbol of the happiness and joy that the dreamer will experience in the coming period. Sometimes water in a dream is a sign of the abundance of money that the dreamer will receive, whether from work or inheritance. The water that falls from the sky in a dream is a sign of comfort and comfort that God gives to the dreamer in reality. As for the sick person who finds himself in a dream washing with clean water, his dream is a sign of his recovery from these diseases in the near future. The same applies to someone who has worries and sorrows. His dream of bathing is considered one of the signs of comfort and comfort that God will grant him in the future, God willing. Ibn Sirin summarizes that fresh water is a sign of goodness and happiness, and good news for the acquisition of money or the fulfillment of the desires that the dreamer wished for in reality. As for Water that is turbid or contaminated with some impurities cannot be described as good at all, and there are many cases in which seeing water is a sign of evil. Including drinking or consuming bad-smelling water, as well as drinking hot water. These visions are a sign of the worries and sorrows that the dreamer will be exposed to and may be a sign of the difficulties that he will face in his life. Likewise, black water in a dream is a sign of loss of sight in reality, God forbid, and it could be a sign of the destruction of the home and the destruction of the family. Interpretation Seeing water in a dream for a single woman Water in a dream is often a sign of goodness and happiness that the dreamer will reap in her life. This may be a sign that she will get married soon. As for an unmarried woman who sees turbid water or contains dirt and filth, her dream is a sign of the problems and difficulties that she will face that she will not be able to solve easily and it may be a sign that she will live a miserable life. Life with a man she does not love. Interpretation of seeing water in a dream for a married woman. Fresh water in a married woman’s dream, if it is pure, is a sign of great happiness and love that she enjoys with her husband in reality. Bathing with it in a dream is a sign of getting rid of worries and sorrows
